review:
fantastic movie, i can't understand the reason of it's failure in box office. all actors were great, but i specially liked 
k. k. menon, bhati,piyush mishra and each dialouge of piyush mishra had hidden meaning. dhansa was also fantastic. the only thing i hated was, some scenes were not shown due to the censor board and at times it was quite difficult to relate

super movie, excellent screenplay, dialogues.
story is good too, every character has portrayed its role superbly like dukki bana, ranvijaya singh etc.
music & lyrics by piyush mishra adds to its beauty.
overall a must watch.. 9 out of 10.

a movie which i have watched most in my life.....each time feels like watching it first time....hats off to writer-director....a mile stone set for bollywood.....became biggest fan of anurag kashyap after this movie.
in last for its music and lyrics .....salute to piyush sir.....love you always sir..‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§
what a movie with great story and acting. why these kind of movies doesn't come in t. v.  yarr. t. v mein babal macha denge ye movies
excellent screenplay with a good story line and garnished with powerful dialogues. script is a bit slow. who want a movie which mirrors the ground must watch.

really very nice script.nice acting by all actors specially piyush mishra 5/5. songs are very good and heart touching 
giving 4.6/5.

cult. class. pathbreaking.
one of the most underrated movies in the history of indian cinema. 
better read some histroy of rajputs before watching this gem.
big fan of this movie theatre me dekhi tv pe jb bhi aayi dekhi youtube par.really a great movie acting wise and story wise.
shown truth of seperated rajputs from 1000 of years till now. during our rules if we loses than that is because of seperation. what rajputs all need is unity.
extreme! when story is potrayed in a way which makes you think in one direction where you see mirror of society, values, sarcasm.
whenever i see this movie i feel it breaks all records. best story ever.
best movie everyone should watch this movie gulaal excellent
one of the best bollywood movies of all time
best acting, meaningful songs... hates off piyush mishra.
very good and outstanding movie till date about democracy and india liberal.
